ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 52
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Most likely you ran across one of the scammers out there who is trying to make a few bucks off any scam they can.  I seriously doubt this book had any
ygData.messageBody:
> Also, at the bazaar
> Saturday night, someone was selling a book that allowed smithed to make
> bronze armor with skill over 200 using bronze metal. I forget the name
> of the book and I did not have the 400p that the guy
> was asking for. Does anyone have information on this book?

Most likely you ran across one of the scammers out there who is trying to
make a few bucks off any scam they can. I seriously doubt this book had any
validity what-so-ever. But hey, if it did, great.


Rob
~Chaos, panic, & disorder-my work here is done.~
